translated: Shirley Temple was an American actress and diplomat, born April 23, 1928 in Santa Monica, California, and died February 10, 2014 in Woodside, California.
original: Shirley Temple est une actrice et diplomate américaine, née le 23 avril 1928 à Santa Monica, Californie, et morte le 10 février 2014 à Woodside, Californie.
